trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a unit of work that a user can undo.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula uma unidade de trabalho que um usuário pode desfazer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> class is a nested class within <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoEngine%2A> that encapsulates an action that a user can undo.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> classe é uma classe aninhada dentro de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoEngine%2A> que encapsula uma ação que um usuário pode desfazer.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> implementation monitors change notifications and builds up a list of events for each change.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> monitora as notificações de alteração de implementação e cria uma lista de eventos para cada alteração.

trans-unit.source: It saves these events using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService>.
trans-unit.target: Ele salva esses eventos usando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationService>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> receives event notifications for changes directly from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoEngine%2A> through several `public virtual` methods.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> recebe notificações de eventos para alterações diretamente do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoEngine%2A> por meio de várias `public virtual` métodos.

trans-unit.source: You can derive from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> and perform any additional logic.
trans-unit.target: Você pode derivar de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> e executar qualquer lógica adicional.

trans-unit.source: If desired, you can completely bypass the default <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Se desejar, você pode ignorar completamente o padrão <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> implementação.

trans-unit.source: The undo engine that owns this undo unit.
trans-unit.target: O mecanismo de desfazer que é proprietário dessa unidade de desfazer.

trans-unit.source: The name for this undo unit.
trans-unit.target: O nome dessa unidade de desfazer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="engine" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="engine" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Receives a call from the undo engine to close this unit.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma chamada do mecanismo de desfazer para fechar essa unidade.

trans-unit.source: When a unit is closed, no more events can come into its various event methods.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma unidade é fechada, nenhum evento mais pode vir em seus vários métodos de evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> itself may take action here to ensure that any events that are currently open are closed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> em si pode agir aqui para garantir que todos os eventos que são abertos são fechados.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Receives a call from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> in response to a <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma chamada do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> em resposta a um evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Receives a call from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> in response to a <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma chamada do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> em resposta a um evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Receives a call from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> in response to a <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma chamada do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> em resposta a um evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Receives a call from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> in response to a <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma chamada do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> em resposta a um evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Receives a call from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> in response to a <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma chamada do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> em resposta a um evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Receives a call from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> in response to a <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma chamada do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> em resposta a um evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentRenameEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentRenameEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Receives a call from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> in response to a <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRename" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Recebe uma chamada do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine" /> em resposta a um evento <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRename" />.

trans-unit.source: The type of service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de serviço a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the requested service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância do serviço solicitado.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the given service, or <see langword="null" /> if the service cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do serviço determinado ou <see langword="null" /> se o serviço não puder ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit" /> contains no events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit" /> não contém eventos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit" /> contains no events; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit" /> não contém eventos; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The undo engine may discard empty units.
trans-unit.target: O mecanismo de desfazer pode descartar unidades vazias.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the current name of the unit.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o nome atual da unidade.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the current name of the unit.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa o nome atual da unidade.

trans-unit.source: Performs an undo or redo action.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma ação de desfazer ou refazer.

trans-unit.source: Undo actions toggle themselves between undo and redo states, so calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> twice sets the object back to its original state.
trans-unit.target: Ações de desfazer alternar se desfazer e refazer estados, por isso a chamada <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> define duas vezes o objeto de volta ao estado original.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> class initially assumes that the undoable work has already been done, so the first call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> undoes the work.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit> classe inicialmente assume que o trabalho não pode ser desfeito já foi feito, portanto, a primeira chamada para <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> desfaz o trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The next call undoes the previous undo operation, performing a redo.
trans-unit.target: A próxima chamada desfaz a operação de desfazer anterior, executando uma restauração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore%2A> method to perform an undo operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> chamadas de método de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore%2A> método para executar uma operação de desfazer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> method itself works to maintain consistent state within the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit>, even in the event of an exception thrown by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> próprio método funciona para manter o estado consistente dentro do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit>, mesmo no caso de uma exceção gerada pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore" /> method directly; override it if you want, but always call the <see langword="public" /><see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo" /> method to perform undo work.
trans-unit.target: Não chame o <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore" /> método substituí-la diretamente; se você quiser, mas sempre chamar o <see langword="public" /> <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo" /> método para executar o trabalho de desfazer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo" /> method notifies the undo engine to suspend undo data gathering until the current undo operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo" /> método notifica o mecanismo de desfazer para suspender até que a operação de desfazer atual seja concluída de coleta de dados de desfazer.

trans-unit.source: This prevents new undo units from being created in response to this unit doing work.
trans-unit.target: Isso impede que novas unidades de desfazer está sendo criado em resposta a essa unidade de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo" /> to perform an undo action.
trans-unit.target: Chamado por um <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo" /> para executar uma ação de desfazer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore%2A> method to perform an undo operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> chamadas de método de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore%2A> método para executar uma operação de desfazer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> method itself works to maintain consistent state within the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit>, even in the event of an exception thrown by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo%2A> próprio método funciona para manter o estado consistente dentro do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit>, mesmo no caso de uma exceção gerada pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore" /> method directly; override it if you want, but always call the <see langword="public" /><see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo" /> method to perform undo work.
trans-unit.target: Não chame o <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoCore" /> método substituí-la diretamente; se você quiser, mas sempre chamar o <see langword="public" /> <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo" /> método para executar o trabalho de desfazer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo" /> method notifies the undo engine to suspend undo-operation data gathering until the current undo operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.Undo" /> método notifica o mecanismo de desfazer para suspender até que a operação de desfazer atual seja concluída de coleta de dados de operação de desfazer.

trans-unit.source: This prevents new undo units from being created in response to this unit doing work.
trans-unit.target: Isso impede que novas unidades de desfazer está sendo criado em resposta a essa unidade de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoEngine" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o pai <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoEngine" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoEngine" /> to which this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit" /> is attached.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit.UndoEngine" /> ao qual este <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.UndoEngine.UndoUnit" /> está anexado.
